entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
